title: November 16, 2010 3PM
content:
Health Updates: chocolate; black raspberry vs colon cancer; calcium, bone density; krill oil, anti-inflammatory;... <!--more--> Alzheimer’s & environmental toxins, mercury.
Commentary: medical fraud, corporate science Dr Brad Case is a holistic chiropractor, naturopath & clinical director of the Holistic Healing Center in Prunedale, Ca.
He works to expose the myths & lies perpetuated by conventional medicine, our federal health agencies & mainstream corporate media. His recent book, “Thugs, Drugs and the War on Bugs: How the Natural Healthcare Revolution Will Lead Us Past Greed, Ego and Scary Germs,” is his first in his healthcare series “Why We’re Sick” www.SelfGrowth.com
